game.name: Wrong path
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Narrated Game Menus, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: (Eastern Fantasy × Puzzle Narrative × Multi-Ending Fate Choices) Uncover story layers through branching choices. Hidden enigmas unfold. Among countless deaths, one path survives. Perhaps revealed early, reaching it demands perseverance.
game.shortDescriptionEn: (Eastern Fantasy × Puzzle Narrative × Multi-Ending Fate Choices) Uncover story layers through branching choices. Hidden enigmas unfold. Among countless deaths, one path survives. Perhaps revealed early, reaching it demands perseverance.
